text: Francis Ogola (born 1 July 1973 in Lira) is a retired Ugandan sprinter who specialized in the 400 metres. His personal bests were 21.03 seconds over 200 metres (from 1995) and 45.47 s over 400 metres (from 1993). ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1991 |All-Africa Games |Cairo, Egypt |bgcolor="cc9966" align="center" | 3rd |400m |46.21 |- |1992 |World Junior Championships |Seoul, South Korea |bgcolor="cc9966"|3rd |400m |46.16 |} ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lira District Category:Ugandan male sprinters Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1994 Commonwealth Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Uganda Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Uganda Category:African Games bronze medalists for Uganda Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1991 All-Africa Games
title: Francis Ogola
